text: Rebecca Peterson was the defending champion, but chose not to participate. Kristie Ahn won the title, defeating Amanda Anisimova in the final, 1–6, 6–2, 6–2. ==Seeds== ==Draw== ===Finals=== ===Top half=== ===Bottom half=== ==References== *Main Draw Hardee's Pro Classic - Singles
title: 2017 Hardee's Pro Classic – Singles
